original_text: And each of the builders had his sword strapped at his side while he built. The man who sounded the trumpet was beside me.
korean_text: 건축하는 자는 각각 허리에 칼을 차고 건축하며 나팔 부는 자는 내 곁에 섰었느니라

sentences.original_text: And each of the builders had his sword strapped at his side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 건축하는 자 각 사람은 허리에 칼을 차고 있었는데
